post.body: Why are you "racing" to your flight? Are you going to be late?
Hey Pete - I listened to the whole thing - I think I wanna be a missionary :-)
Thanks for that Pete! Haven't watched the whole thing yet but it's great to see Brad again. His boys were up here a bit ago.
Why do you have holes in your shoes? You don't live in PNG anymore!
I actually got to do that once, filmed Lapilo from our helicopter a few years back with the door open and my foot on the skid!
http://twitpic.com/ni6e - This is hilarious Stephen!!! With all the bows and arrows around, I hope they like your video...
I love being on this side of the world cuz Fridays get here faster then they do in America...but then, so do Mondays...
Absorbing every picture and video little Cannon! I want to kiss him and squeeze him til he says "grandma stop!" though he can't talk yet :-)
Got to see my grandbaby via video - I kinda wanted to kiss the screen but it's pretty dusty.
Can't wait to see my grandbaby through the eyes of his Aunt Bree - that's right, I'm still in PNG, but Bree & Pete are in SAN DIEGO
I'm ok with the fact that my son can make better chocolate chip cookies than I can. The fact that he makes them is the important thing.
Teaching my son how to Twitter
wondering who gave me this stupid cold...I didn't think you could catch a cold over the internet
The tree is officially trimmed! Sean did the whole thing in tribute to his last PNG Christmas...he should go into business - it's beautiful!
Christmas decorating on a hot PNG day. Could use a torrential rainstorm to add to the atmosphere, but not today I guess.
Having a bout with vertigo. Seems one of my ears is out of sync with the other. C'mon head - get your act together!
Made my pie and my jello salad. Need to cook my kaukau now.
Town. Mandarin. Second-handing. Sweat. SVS. Sweat. Papindos. Pomalos!!! Sweat. Home. Making dinner.
Not ready for Thanksgiving and then the fast track to Christmas. These holidays just scream "family" and I don't want to feel those holes...
I'm thinking about the little bush dog we ran over going to tournament and the sound and the miscellaneous reactions by people in our van.
Countdown...two more sleeps til MADANG! And I'm heading to bed, so almost ONE - YAY
Watching ELF! Christmas has started!
Ate a PB&J sandwich and didn't see the tiny ants in the jar of PB until AFTER I finished my sandwich. Peanut butter "ant" jelly sandwich :-P
I'm back online after not being able to connect for like 24 hours. Aahhhhh...it's good to be back...anyone miss me?
Spent 6 hours on the boat yesterday - doesn't get much better than that - well it could get better if the guys would catch some fish.
In Madang and breathing deep the ocean air. Plan to go fishing with my guys tomorrow - a FIRST - maybe I'll be the reason they catch fish!
Wondering why Twitter didn't update my FB status....I said...I'm packing for MADANG!!! must...get...out...of...lapilo...soon...
Packing for MADANG - can't get out of here soon enough...
Steve got amazing strawberries at the market today. We just ate them with sour cream & brown sugar and it felt like we were in the States.
